sentences.en: I turned aside to realign the photographs of my children on the shelf.
sentences.cn: 我转过身去把架子上孩子们的照片重新摆了摆。

sentences.en: The company is planning to realign its sales operations.
sentences.cn: 公司正在计划重组销售业务。

sentences.en: Then realign the print head using the new values by clicking Apply.
sentences.cn: 然后用新数值重新调整打印头,单击“应用”.

words.tran_cn: 重新排列；再结盟；改组；重组

trans.tran_en: to change the way in which something is organized
